mapper.select: select id, pw, name, email, phonenum, gender, memberlevel from Member where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
select count(*) from Member where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw}, name=#{name}, email=#{email}, phonenum=#{phonenum} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from member where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
mapper.select: select r1.roomcode from roommember r1 join roomdetail r2 on r1.roomcode = r2.roomcode where r1.id=#{id};
